alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 1:44PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Yuma County, Gila Bend, Northwest Pinal County, West Pinal County and Sonoran Desert National Monument. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Localized dense blowing dust with abrupt and dangerous restrictions to visibility will be possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; West Pinal County
